Name: Horrifical Maze
About the game: Horrifical Maze Is A 3D Realistic Horror-Adventure Game. Travel Threw Mazes And Complete Missions, Survive, And Escape. This Game Contains Features That Most Games Don't Offer On Steam. Over Hours Of Gameplay. Horrifical Maze Includes: Free Updates All Future Content Updates for this game will be free to download. Full Mouse And Keyboard Support Mouse and Keyboard input devices can be used In-Menu and In-World. ('In-World' Meaning 'In The Mazes') PlayStation And Xbox Controller Support The PlayStation Controller Support is only functional In-World. Xbox Controller Support is Coming in a future update. No Advertisements No Advertisements will appear in this game because this is the premium version. Startable Offline Internet Is Not Needed To Start This Game. Offline Single-Player This Player-Mode can be played without the internet. Online Multi-Player Modes (Including Offline LAN) Coming in a future update. Mission Mode Complete A Numerous Amount Of Missions in A Staggering Amount Of 3D Mazes. Unlimited Frame-Rates Per Second Which Allows the player to reach the Highest frame-rates-per-second on there device. Great For Slow And Fast Devices This game shouldn't require much from a device to run smoothly. (depending on the selected visual-detail mode) User-First-Person-View First-Person-View Perspective allows the user to have a view, like you would in real-life. (not a camera view over the shoulder or behind your back) User-Appearance Selection Coming in a future update. User Field-Of-View Editor You can adjust the Field-Of-View feature to be able to see more on the screen. A Great Amount Of Different Regions Regions Represent a different kind of environment In the mazes. Ultra-Fast Loading Speeds Most Devices should be able to load in to anything in the game within 10 seconds. This game offers much more, but will not be all explained in this description.
